title: Navikate and the Sound of the Sea
description: Have you ever wondered why you hear the sound of the sea when you hold a shell to your ear? Then wonder no more. In Navikate and the Sound of the Sea, Mama Crab will explain why in this humorous rhyming picture book. Her lovable daughter, Navikate, will take you on a journey through the ocean looking for the right shell that has been blessed by Mama Crab. She will meet characters like Mr. Arms, the octopus, and the Big Blue Whale who try to capture Navikate.This delightful book has real vocabulary in it as well as a Parent/Teacher Reading Support Plan to help to build the reading comprehension of the children reading or listening to the book.Very unique idea to add this to the story!!!
author: The Sisters Spurlock
